question:
You have seen advertisement in an australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.
Write a letter to the parents. In your latter 
Explain why you would like the job
Give details of why would be a suitable person to employ 
Say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing to express my interest in joining your family and caring for your kid. I have some justifications to choose this  job. The first  point is that I am an extroverted person and I can adapt to new people quickly. Another ground is that, due to having several nieces and nephews, I am able to communicate with children and have a good relationship with them. Moreover, I have  studied a lot of books about babies and teenagers and learned how to deal with them .

If you are looking for a babysitter who has a certification in First Aid I am graduated with a senior emergency-care certificate. it should be noticed that  I visited Australia recently and I have some plans for my free time. I will have visited tourist places in Australia, I will also have tasted many local dishes,  then  I am going to take a cooking course.
Thanks in advance for your kind consideration. I am looking forward to hearing from you.
